org.elasticsearch.transport

类 TcpTransport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractLifecycleComponent
        • org.elasticsearch.transport.TcpTransport
  • 所有已实现的接口:

    public abstract class TcpTransport
extends AbstractLifecycleComponent
implements Transport

      • connectToNode

        public void connectToNode(DiscoveryNode node,
                          ConnectionProfile connectionProfile,
                          CheckedBiConsumer<Transport.Connection,ConnectionProfile,java.io.IOException> connectionValidator)
                   throws ConnectTransportException
        从接口复制的说明: Transport
        Connects to a node with the given connection profile. If the node is already connected this method has no effect. Once a successful is established, it can be validated before being exposed.
        指定者:
        connectToNode 在接口中 Transport
        抛出:
        ConnectTransportException

      • resolveConnectionProfile

        protected ConnectionProfile resolveConnectionProfile(ConnectionProfile connectionProfile)

      • openConnection

        public final TcpTransport.NodeChannels openConnection(DiscoveryNode node,
                                                      ConnectionProfile connectionProfile)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: Transport
        Opens a new connection to the given node and returns it. In contrast to Transport.connectToNode(DiscoveryNode, ConnectionProfile, CheckedBiConsumer) the returned connection is not managed by the transport implementation. This connection must be closed once it's not needed anymore. This connection type can be used to execute a handshake between two nodes before the node will be published via Transport.connectToNode(DiscoveryNode, ConnectionProfile, CheckedBiConsumer).
        指定者:
        openConnection 在接口中 Transport
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • getConnection

        public TcpTransport.NodeChannels getConnection(DiscoveryNode node)
        从接口复制的说明: Transport
        Returns a connection for the given node if the node is connected. Connections returned from this method must not be closed. The lifecycle of this connection is maintained by the Transport implementation.
        指定者:
        getConnection 在接口中 Transport
        另请参阅:
        Transport.connectToNode(DiscoveryNode, ConnectionProfile, CheckedBiConsumer)

      • bind

        protected abstract TcpChannel bind(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.net.InetSocketAddress address)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Binds to the given InetSocketAddress
        参数:
        name - the profile name
        address - the address to bind to
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • initiateChannel

        protected abstract TcpChannel initiateChannel(DiscoveryNode node,
                                              TimeValue connectTimeout,
                                              ActionListener<java.lang.Void> connectListener)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Initiate a single tcp socket channel to a node. Implementations do not have to observe the connectTimeout. It is provided for synchronous connection implementations.
        参数:
        node - the node
        connectTimeout - the connection timeout
        connectListener - listener to be called when connection complete
        返回:
        the pending connection
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O exception occurs while opening the channel

      • stopInternal

        protected void stopInternal()
        Called to tear down internal resources

        public boolean canCompress(TransportRequest request)

      • sendErrorResponse

        public void sendErrorResponse(Version nodeVersion,
                              TcpChannel channel,
                              java.lang.Exception error,
                              long requestId,
                              java.lang.String action)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Sends back an error response to the caller via the given channel
        参数:
        nodeVersion - the caller node version
        channel - the channel to send the response to
        error - the error to return
        requestId - the request ID this response replies to
        action - the action this response replies to
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • sendResponse

        public void sendResponse(Version nodeVersion,
                         TcpChannel channel,
                         TransportResponse response,
                         long requestId,
                         java.lang.String action,
                         TransportResponseOptions options)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Sends the response to the given channel. This method should be used to send TransportResponse objects back to the caller.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        另请参阅:
        for sending back errors to the caller

      • validateMessageHeader

        public static boolean validateMessageHeader(BytesReference buffer)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Validates the first N bytes of the message header and returns false if the message is a ping message and has no payload ie. isn't a real user level message.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the message is too short, less than the header or less that the header plus the message size
        TcpTransport.HttpOnTransportException - if the message has no valid header and appears to be a HTTP message
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the message is greater that the maximum allowed frame size. This is dependent on the available memory.
        java.io.IOException

      • messageReceived

        public final void messageReceived(BytesReference reference,
                                  TcpChannel channel,
                                  java.lang.String profileName,
                                  java.net.InetSocketAddress remoteAddress,
                                  int messageLengthBytes)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        This method handles the message receive part for both request and responses
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
